channel.title: 10 push ups
channel.description:
Well, I visit a parkour website pretty frequently, and they have a "10 pushup per post" challenge. Granted, that forum is full of more physically fit people, I figure it couldn't hurt to try to start it up here. What this challenge entails is doing 10 pushups for every post you make. Of course just pumping out a ton of pushups isn't really going to help anything, and the body will actually end up adapting to it and it won't be effective at all, so feel free to modify it to doing some pushups one week, sit ups the next, burpees, etc etc. The idea is just to get active.
Here's a link to a picture they put in their signature on the site:
[img]http://i1012.photobucket.com/albums/af242/A-SkyfiOriginal/10PostChM2105.png[/img]
Since mitb doesn't allow images in sigs I just have a link to it in mine lol. I plan on following this challenge the best I can.
brb 10 pushups.

Then proceed to man up and do all of your pushups in one sitting.[/quote]

item.title: 10 push ups
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“Evil_, post:26, topic:390587”][quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=486496.msg3565698#msg3565698 date=1302635767]

Oh and if you’re not going to do the pushups the correct way, you probably just shouldn’t do them at all :\

Define correct way since there are many variations of push-ups. I usually do arms shoulder-width apart.

Back straight, head up, none of that ‘on your knees/girl pushup’ pussy shit that does damn near nothing.
[/quote]If someone doesn’t have the muscle to do them correctly, they still get a workout doing them from their knees.[/quote]
If you truly can’t do regular push ups, fine. But 10 good push ups really aren’t that hard to do.

Read full topic

If anyone is truly interested, I would suggest signing up for the WOD (workout of the day) which is usually a version of the crossfit WOD.[/quote]

Oh and if you’re not going to do the pushups the correct way, you probably just shouldn’t do them at all :\
